short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect and suggest edits for gender bias in text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BiasGuard helps detect gender based biases in any forms of text. This can include any writing matters in the professional context, such as performance reviews, emails, and updates. We promote gender neutral communication by analyzing written content for gender bias, and suggesting alternative, more inclusive phrases. This could also be used for social media platforms.
